content: I wonder which one's the appropriate issue queue for our FAPI. I just realized that there are multiple examples using variable_get() - with links to module files that do not use variable_get at all. If I recall correctly, the FAPI page is a view assembled from content snippets.
Correct. As such, the Form API is content on the API site. So an issue there is the best place.

In case it wasn't clear by what @BWPanda said ...this is the right issue queue for anything related to the api docs: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org/issues

backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org
API website for displaying Backdrop CMS source code and developer documentation. - backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org

Many thanks @BWPanda and @klonos . It turned out, there's already an issue for that.

Update Form API 'Usage Examples' 路 Issue #88 路 backdrop-ops/api.backdropcms.org
A lot of the 'Usage Examples' on the Form API page are from modules that were removed from Backdrop (e.g. forum, profile). We should update those examples with ones that are still in core. ...
